short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search and find high quality Pokemon TCG images right on any page you are on, and even then go straight to TCGPlayer!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One of your favourite Pokemon TCG Twitch Extensions moved into a Google Chrome Extension! Look up any Pokemon Card (in English) quick and easy on any tab you are on! Even links straight to TCGPlayer for easy purchases!
